@lustforlife This article is frightening. Although the statistics are US based, teachers I work with here in Ireland are also commenting that anxiety is more common than ever in schools now (in their opinions). A nurturing approach needs to be created to support this!

@fboss A Nurture Group is a great way we can cater for the social, emotional and behavior difficulties evident in schools. From working in @PhoenixParkSch We have found it effective.It encourages pupil interaction,self regulation and a safe space for pupils to feel valued. #edchatie ðŸ€

A little treat for our warriors today after six weeks of wellbeing and nurturing activities. With fantastic feedback from each boy, we are so grateful to help these pupils feel empowered, confident and happy in school ðŸ¤—@amandamcd97 https://t.co/WzIc5vW71F
